backend/main.mo: Defines a Motoko actor that stores contact inquiries in a map and exposes submit and query endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata listing updated files, components, and test IDs for two product and cart-related features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for reference or build tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH color tokens and global light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up theme provider, router configuration, shared layout, and routes for landing and inquiries pages.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartSheet.t: Implements a cart drawer UI with quantity controls, item removal, totals, and empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an about section with highlight cards and descriptive studio information.
frontend/src/components/sections/Catalog: Displays the products list with pricing and supports adding items to the cart with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Provides a contact form with validation, backend submission, and a temporary success message state.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Landing hero block with background image, headline, and buttons that smooth-scroll to contact and portfolio sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Displays a grid of portfolio items with audio previews using cards and static sample metadata.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Renders a services overview grid with icons and brief descriptions of offered audio services.
Footer with company info, contact details, social links, and a dynamic year plus caffeine.ai attribution.
Sticky header with logo, navigation links that smooth-scroll to sections, mobile sheet menu, and cart access.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines the Product interface and exports a small list of store products with optional pricing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Zustand store for cart items with add, remove, quantity update, totals, and persisted state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiries.ts: React Query hook that fetches inquiries from the backend actor once available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and AuthClient management.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContact.ts: Provides a React Query mutation hook to validate and submit contact form data via an actor and show toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with typography and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/InquiriesPage.tsx: Displays submitted contact inquiries with loading, error, empty, and table views using UI components.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the main landing page composed of multiple content sections such as hero, services, catalog, portfolio, about, and contact.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, existing features, and requirements for building an audio business website with product showcase and contact features.
